item.title: 【Music Videos】Au/Ra & Alan Walker - Ghost [4K HEVC 10-bit / PCM 24-bit]
item.description:
Genre: Electronic, Pop
Style: House, Dance-pop, Trap
Year: 2019
Video Source: Apple Music, thanks CAPRiCE24
Audio Source: Qobuz Hi-Res, thanks medicine

"Ghost" is a song produced by British-Norwegian music producer and DJ Alan Walker and performed by Ibiza-Born Antiguan-German singer-songwriter Au/Ra, released on October 17, 2019. It's the second track of Death Stranding: Timefall. Death Stranding: Timefall (Original Music from the World of Death Stranding) is a soundtrack album for the 2019 action game, Death Stranding. Featuring eight songs from various artists, it was released on November 7, 2019 in digital stores, through RCA Records and Sony Interactive Entertainment. It was included in all special editions of the game.

The reason why the Japanese game developers trusted Alan Walker and Au/Ra to feature their special soundtrack is not something casual. The abilities from both artists are undeniable and this record is the ultimate proof of that. ‘Ghost‘ is a pure commercial trap track that perfectly showcases the producer and singer’s unique abilities that brought them to the main gates of the electronic music scene. Taking a more commercial approach and distancing himself from his classic future bass sounds, Alan Walker still finds a way to adapt his style delivering a very solid production. He creates a rhythmic and melodic bass filling it with a more tragic and alarming sound that becomes the perfect companion for the deep vocals from Au/Ra. Just as she did in other projects like ‘Panic Room‘ with CamelPhat, the Antiguan singer takes the lead role to impact the listener with her voice and set the tone of the song.

Release Info
The video track is from Apple Music (2160p HEVC 10-bit), with the intro removed.
The PCM track is lossless (Qobuz Hi-Res 24-bit), synced with Adobe Audition.
The timed lyrics are synced and edited to match the video track.
Enable the subtitles to see the lyrics.

item.title: 【UPSCALED】Alan Walker & Au/Ra - Somebody Like U [4K AI Upscale HEVC 10-bit / PCM 24-bit]
item.description:
Genre: Electronic, Pop
Style: Electro House, Dance-pop
Year: 2022
Video Source: Apple Music, thanks Brungor
Audio Source: Qobuz, thanks Danielo007

"Somebody Like U" is a song produced by British-Norwegian music producer and DJ Alan Walker and Ibiza-Born Antiguan-German singer-songwriter Au/Ra, released on June 10, 2022. It's the second track from the Extended play Walkerverse, Pt. I, released on June 17, 2022. It was written by Mats Lie Skåre, Marcus Arnbekk, Fredrik Borch Olsen, Gunnar Greve, Øyvind Sauvik and Jamie Lou Stenzel. Produced by Alan Walker, Kasper and Gunnar Greve.

The accompanying music video was directed by Kristian Berg.
Alan Walker said: "For the last few months, I have been traveling far and wide to surprise Walkers from all walks of life, with the aim of giving them something special, namely the pendants. I met some of you backstage, some on stage, and others while you were out doing normal everyday stuff. I was moved by your reactions! I am excited to show you the process alongside the seriously talented Au/Ra."

Release Info
The video track is upscaled to 4K with Topaz Video AI and converted to HEVC 10-bit.
The PCM track is lossless (Qobuz, HiRes 24-bit), synced with Adobe Audition.
The timed lyrics are synced and edited to match the music video.
Enable the subtitles to see the lyrics.
